name: BROAD DAYLIGHT CD
description:
Our debut CD is finally available!!
10 tracks of pure pleasure!
1. Pieces of puzzles
2. You by my side
3. Trapped and confined
4. Walking shame
5. Everything's ok
6. Diseased or blind
7. So many goodbyes
8. Remember
9. Why forgive
10. I can't stand you

Produced by : Gautier Marinof
Music recorded at : Studio Vortex (R.I.P)
Vocals recorded at : Studio Piccolo
Mixed and edited at : Studio Piccolo
Mixed and recorded by : Gautier Marinof
Mastered by : Ryan Morey
Mastered at : Ryebread Mastering
Drum Tech : Rene (Redge) Adolph (Drum and drummer)
Photos by : Marilyse Boulais
Album artwork : Simon Picard

name: T-SHIRT MEN
description:
Available colors are as follows :

Black with Gold Broad Daylight logo
Black with Green Broad Daylight logo
White with Gold Broad Daylight logo
White with Black Broad Daylight logo

Size available are :

Small
Medium
Large

Please don't forget to specify which size and color you want with your paypal payment!

name: T-SHIRT WOMEN
description:
Available colors are as follows :

Black with Gold Broad Daylight logo
Black with Green Broad Daylight logo
White with Gold Broad Daylight logo
White with Green Broad Daylight logo

Size available are :

Medium
XLarge

Please be advised that you should take 1 size bigger than usual as theses shirts run a little tight.
Please don't forget to specify which size and color you want with your paypal payment!

name: BROAD DAYLIGHT HAT
description:
Our first hat is now available!
One size fits all, Flex-Fit!
